screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .brushcategory file in Corel Painter 2023
screenshot.caption: BRUSHCATEGORY file open in Corel Painter 2023

description: An example of a Painter brush category and its brush variants is the Markers category. It contains specific brushes, such as Fine Tip Marker, Leaky Marker, and Sharp Marker, each with unique settings to customize its appearance.

You can create a new brush category in Painter by selecting Brushes → New Brush Category... . Additionally, you can export a category as a BRUSHCATEGORY file by selecting Brushes → Export → Category .

images.alt: Screenshot of a .brushcategory file in Corel Painter 2023
images.caption: BRUSHCATEGORY file open in Corel Painter 2023
